snippet: The pianist Paul Lewis made his New York Philharmonic debut at Avery Fisher Hall on Thursday with a Brahms concerto.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Paul Lewis at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Paul Lewis made his New York Philharmonic debut at Avery Fisher Hall on Thursday with a Brahms concerto.

headline.print_headline: Highlighting the Classical, Hitting the Mystical, Flirting With the Demonic
headline.seo: The Pianist Paul Lewis Makes His Philharmonic Debut
headline.main: Highlighting the Classical, Hitting the Mystical, Flirting With the Demonic
